itinerary.route: Lago di Braies to Rifugio Biella
itinerary.mapNote: First refuge. Lago di Braies start 1496m. Rif. Biella 2327m.
Heart of the Fanes plateau. Ladin legend country. 2060m.
Highest refuge on route, cable car access. 2752m — route highpoint.

itinerary.route: Rifugio Lagazuoi to Rif. Cinque Torri
itinerary.mapNote: Below the iconic five towers. WWI museum nearby. 2137m.

itinerary.route: Rif. Cinque Torri to Rif. Città di Fiume
itinerary.mapNote: Remote refuge on Croda da Lago plateau. 2040m.

itinerary.route: Rif. Città di Fiume to Rifugio Coldai
itinerary.mapNote: Above Lago di Alleghe. View of Civetta face. 2132m.
In the Civetta group. Wild and remote. 1714m.
Last rifugio. Descent to Agordo / Belluno valley. 1834m.

waypoints.name: Lago di Braies
waypoints.note: Emerald lake start. Most photographed lake in the Dolomites.

waypoints.name: Rifugio Lagazuoi (High Pt)
waypoints.note: Route highpoint. WWI tunnel system inside mountain. 360° views.

waypoints.name: Cinque Torri
waypoints.note: Five iconic towers. WWI open-air museum with original trenches.

waypoints.name: Civetta North Face
waypoints.note: One of the great Alpine north walls. Seen from Coldai hut.

waypoints.name: Marmolada Glacier
waypoints.note: Highest Dolomite glacier. Visible from Coldai/Viel dal Pan area.

waypoints.name: Croda da Lago
waypoints.note: Beautiful lake below the crags. Città di Fiume area.
